items.title: Static website hosting with Azure Storage

outboundReferences.contextLine: If you have an [[azure-storage-account]], you can **serve static content** (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and image files) directly from a storage container named `$web`.

inboundReferences.contextLine: You can even use Azure Storage publish static content (see [[static-website-hosting-with-azure-storage]]).

fields.title: AZ-204 - Developing Solutions for Microsoft Azure
Static website hosting with Azure Storage
